message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to make a serious offer.
